title: Where is C Space?
body: C Space HQ is at 938A, Rd Number 47, Silent Valley hills, Jubilee Hills, Hyderabad, Telangana 500033. https://goo.gl/maps/DmUCojT8NHKiZ66QA

title: What is the subscription fee?
body: C Space is a creative coworking space for the most passionate filmmakers. Just money and no plan won't get you a seat at the C-Space. If you plan to work seriously towards making films, creators of all the 24 film crafts are welcome. The membership fee if you get through, is INR 8000 per month+GST.

title: Are you a film making school/institute?
body: No, there is not going to be any top-down teaching or courses. We nurtute creators to bloom from portfolio to production intent end to end.

title: Can I get a job at C-Space?
body: Depends. We periodically hire to increase the core team. Please check our website for more details.

title: What are the office hours?
body: Our doors are always open for great creators. Office Support is available from 10 AM to 5 PM.

title: How can I get more information about C Space?
body: Call +91-8766774769 between 10 AM to 5 PM / Check our website / Drop by the CSpace HQ

title: How to collaborate with C Space?
body: Please fill in the details on our website.

title: Is it a coffee shop?
body: No. However, if you have the quality to get through, our coffee is actually free.

title: Make me famous. Give me a chance. Show me to the world. Can C Space help me?
body: Sure. It requires great humility and exceptional creativity to be successful. C Space is on a mission to nurture stories and storytellers to full bloom.

title: Coworking
body: We provide the necessary infrastructure for a thriving filmmaking environment
We give ample opportunities for networking and building teams
We enable systematic collaboration with co-creators is another key offering of C-Space

title: Incubator/Studio
body: We nurture, showcase and manage star talent who are humble, passionate and disruptively creative.
We bring rigor and tactical nous to creative production aspects of filmmaking.
We provide project consulting and agent services for exceptional talent
We deliver Investment Management services for individuals/ producers looking to finance great films.
We provide consultation on technical products in the evolving global film production landscape.
